author: abrinke1
body:
This PR fixes the params needed for successful O2O of L1T EMTF:
 - Remove unused "Endcap", now use "EndCap"
 - Change "EMTF-1" to "EMTFp1"

This has been tested offline and has been running centrally at P5 as local installation on condb machines as fix to L1T O2O.
title: L1T EMTF O2O 2018
